message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's important to reach a fair deal quickly before inflation eats away at the value.
Your offer was a little greedy, Alice. Let's be fair to each other and split the value more evenly while it's still high.
Bob, I understand you want a fair split, but my initial offer was already generous considering the time pressure.  Let's meet in the middle - 55/45.
